articles.title: ‘First 2-3 days were really tough’: Shahid Afridi gives update on health - WATCH - Hindustan Times
articles.description: “I wanted to make this video as I have been hearing a lot about my health on social media since the past few days. First 2-3 days were really tough for me but my condition has been improving in the past few days,” Shahid Afridi said.
articles.content: Former Pakistan captain Shahid Afridi, who revealed on Twitter last week that he tested positive for coronavirus, gave an update on his health in a video he released on Facebook. In the video, Afridi… [+1752 chars]

articles.description: An innings without which India’s 1983 World Cup dreams would have ended.
articles.content: It is a lovely sight here with those rhododendrons in full bloom as Rawson comes in to Kapil Dev who has 99...this one is nudged into offside and they go through for the single. (cheers and applause)… [+14005 chars]
